title: AI 热点（示例）
window: 最近 24–36 小时（示例数据）

items.title: Voxtral Transcribe 2 released
items.summary: Mistral announced an update focused on speech transcription / speech-related capabilities. Useful for meeting notes, customer support QA, and voice assistants; check the official post for details.

items.title: Claude is a space to think
items.summary: Anthropic published a post positioning Claude as a structured space for thinking and complex task work. Useful as a workflow companion for planning, writing, and multi-step reasoning.

items.title: From guardrails to governance: securing agentic systems
items.summary: MIT Technology Review discusses moving from prompt-level guardrails to boundary governance for agentic systems (identity, tools, data, approvals). Useful as a practical checklist for enterprise agent deployment.

items.title: 面壁开源 MiniCPM-o 4.5：全双工全模态、强调主动交互
items.summary: 报道强调模型可“边看边听边说”，更接近实时对话/多模态助理形态。对产品价值：适合做实时语音+视觉交互原型、低成本多模态体验验证。
